column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Here in Midtown
column2: a quick Google search will reveal a "pricey" average for apartment rentals and home-sale prices
column3: and our location at The Mix is no different. In other words
column4: goods and services in Midtown in general tend to be on the pricier side. That said
column6: I believe JINYA offers a premium product at a competitive price; moreover
column7: I will add that a great amount of work goes into (and has gone into) every bowl of JINYA ramen.
